description.compact:
Class representing Header 
  <xs:element name="Header"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="AuditFileVersion"/> <xs:element ref="CompanyID"/> <xs:element name="TaxRegistrationNumber" type="SAFPTPortugueseVatNumber"/> <xs:element ref="TaxAccountingBasis"/> <xs:element ref="CompanyName"/> <xs:element ref="BusinessName" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="CompanyAddress"/> <xs:element ref="FiscalYear"/> <xs:element ref="StartDate"/> <xs:element ref="EndDate"/> <xs:element name="CurrencyCode" fixed="EUR"/> <xs:element ref="DateCreated"/> <xs:element ref="TaxEntity"/> <xs:element ref="ProductCompanyTaxID"/> <xs:element ref="SoftwareCertificateNumber"/> <xs:element ref="ProductID"/> <xs:element ref="ProductVersion"/> <xs:element ref="HeaderComment" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="Telephone" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="Fax" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="Email" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="Website" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>

<xs:element ref="CompanyID"/> <xs:element name="CompanyID">     <xs:annotation>         <xs:documentation>Concatenacao da Conservatoria do Registo Comercial com o numero do             registo comercial separados pelo caracter espaco. Nos casos em que nao existe o             registo comercial, deve ser indicado o NIF.</xs:documentation>     </xs:annotation>     <xs:simpleType>         <xs:restriction base="xs:string">             <xs:pattern value="([0-9]{9})+|([^^]+ [0-9/]+)"/>             <xs:minLength value="1"/>             <xs:maxLength value="50"/>         </xs:restriction>     </xs:simpleType> </xs:element>

<xs:element ref="StartDate"/> <xs:element name="StartDate" type="SAFPTDateSpan"/> <xs:simpleType name="SAFPTDateSpan">       <xs:restriction base="xs:date">           <xs:minInclusive value="2000-01-01"/>           <xs:maxInclusive value="9999-12-31"/>       </xs:restriction>   </xs:simpleType>

<xs:element ref="EndDate"/> <xs:element name="EndDate" type="SAFPTDateSpan"/> <xs:simpleType name="SAFPTDateSpan">       <xs:restriction base="xs:date">           <xs:minInclusive value="2000-01-01"/>           <xs:maxInclusive value="9999-12-31"/>       </xs:restriction>   </xs:simpleType>

<xs:element ref="ProductID"/> <xs:simpleType name="SAFPTProductID">     <xs:restriction base="xs:string">         <xs:pattern value="[^/]+/[^/]+"/>         <xs:minLength value="3"/>         <xs:maxLength value="255"/>     </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>

The item Header contains the general information regarding the taxpayer, whom the SAF-T (PT) refers to.
<xs:element name="Header">

Gets as auditFileVersion
The version of XML scheme to be used is the one available on http://www.portaldasfinancas.gov.pt

Gets as companyID
It is obtained by linking together the name of the commercial registry office and the commercial registration number, separated by a space.

Sets a new companyID
It is obtained by linking together the name of the commercial registry office and the commercial registration number, separated by a space.

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Gets as taxRegistrationNumber
To be filled in with the Portuguese Tax Identification Number/Tax Registration Number without spaces and without country prefixes.
<xs:element name="TaxRegistrationNumber" type="SAFPTPortugueseVatNumber"/>

Sets the taxRegistrationNumber
To be filled in with the Portuguese Tax Identification Number/Tax Registration Number without spaces and without country prefixes.
<xs:element name="TaxRegistrationNumber" type="SAFPTPortugueseVatNumber"/>

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Gets as taxAccountingBasis
Shall be filled in with the type of program, indicating the applicable data (including the transport documents, conference documents and issued receipts, if any):
“C” - Accounting;
“E” - Invoices issued by third parties;
“F” - Invoicing;
“I” - Invoicing and accounting integrated data;
“P” - Invoicing partial data.
“R” - Receipts (a);
“S” - Self-billing;
“T” - Transport documents (a).
(a) Type of program should be indicated, in case only this type of documents are issued. If not, fill in with type “C”, “F” or “I”.

Sets a new taxAccountingBasis
Shall be filled in with the type of program, indicating the applicable data (including the transport documents, conference documents and issued receipts, if any):
“C” - Accounting;
“E” - Invoices issued by third parties;
“F” - Invoicing;
“I” - Invoicing and accounting integrated data;
“P” - Invoicing partial data.
“R” - Receipts (a);
“S” - Self-billing;
“T” - Transport documents (a).
(a) Type of program should be indicated, in case only this type of documents are issued. If not, fill in with type “C”, “F” or “I”.

Gets as companyName
Social designation of the company or taxpayer’s name.
<xs:element ref="CompanyName"/>
<xs:element name="CompanyName" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax100Car"/>

Sets a CompanyName
Social designation of the company or taxpayer’s name.
<xs:element ref="CompanyName"/>
<xs:element name="CompanyName" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax100Car"/>

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Gets as businessName
Commercial designation of the taxpayer
<xs:element ref="BusinessName" minOccurs="0"/>
<xs:element name="BusinessName" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax60Car"/>

Sets a new businessName
Commercial designation of the taxpayer
<xs:element ref="BusinessName" minOccurs="0"/>
<xs:element name="BusinessName" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax60Car"/>

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Gets as companyAddress
<xs:element ref="CompanyAddress"/>
<xs:element name="CompanyAddress" type="AddressStructurePT"/>

Gets Fiscal Year
Use Corporate Income Tax Code rules, in the case of accounting periods that do not coincide with the calendar year.

Sets a Fiscal Year
Use Corporate Income Tax Code rules, in the case of accounting periods that do not coincide with the calendar year.

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Gets Start Date
 <xs:element ref="StartDate"/> <xs:element name="StartDate" type="SAFPTDateSpan"/> <xs:simpleType name="SAFPTDateSpan">       <xs:restriction base="xs:date">           <xs:minInclusive value="2000-01-01"/>           <xs:maxInclusive value="9999-12-31"/>       </xs:restriction>   </xs:simpleType>

The max date allow is the next year

Sets StartDate
 <xs:element ref="StartDate"/> <xs:element name="StartDate" type="SAFPTDateSpan"/> <xs:simpleType name="SAFPTDateSpan">       <xs:restriction base="xs:date">           <xs:minInclusive value="2000-01-01"/>           <xs:maxInclusive value="9999-12-31"/>       </xs:restriction>   </xs:simpleType>

The max date allow is the next year

Gets as endDate
 <xs:element ref="EndDate"/> <xs:element name="EndDate" type="SAFPTDateSpan"/> <xs:simpleType name="SAFPTDateSpan">       <xs:restriction base="xs:date">           <xs:minInclusive value="2000-01-01"/>           <xs:maxInclusive value="9999-12-31"/>       </xs:restriction>   </xs:simpleType>

The max date allow is the next year

Sets a new endDate
 <xs:element ref="EndDate"/> <xs:element name="EndDate" type="SAFPTDateSpan"/> <xs:simpleType name="SAFPTDateSpan">       <xs:restriction base="xs:date">           <xs:minInclusive value="2000-01-01"/>           <xs:maxInclusive value="9999-12-31"/>       </xs:restriction>   </xs:simpleType>

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Gets as currencyCode
Identifies the default currency to use in the monetary type fields in the file. Fill in with "EUR".
<xs:element name="CurrencyCode" fixed="EUR"/>

Gets as dateCreated
Date of creation of file XML of SAF-T (PT)
<xs:element ref="DateCreated"/>

Sets a new dateCreated
Date of creation of file XML of SAF-T (PT)
<xs:element ref="DateCreated"/>
Tthe creation date is setten when the object is created, use this if you wont a diferent date from that one in the OS

Gets as taxEntity
In the case of an invoicing file, it shall be specified which establishment the produced file refers to, if applicable, otherwise it must be filled in with the specification “Global”.

docblock.description:
In the case of an accounting file or integrated file this field must be filled in with the specification “Sede”.
<xs:element ref="TaxEntity"/>
<xs:element name="TaxEntity" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax20Car"/>

description.compact:
Sets a new taxEntity
In the case of an invoicing file, it shall be specified which establishment the produced file refers to, if applicable, otherwise it must be filled in with the specification “Global”.

docblock.description:
In the case of an accounting file or integrated file this field must be filled in with the specification “Sede”.
<xs:element ref="TaxEntity"/>
<xs:element name="TaxEntity" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax20Car"/>

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Gets as productCompanyTaxID
Fill in with the Tax Identification Number/Tax Registration Number of the entity that produced the software.
<xs:element ref="ProductCompanyTaxID"/>
<xs:element name="ProductCompanyTaxID" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax30Car"/>

Sets a new productCompanyTaxID
Fill in with the Tax Identification Number/Tax Registration Number of the entity that produced the software.
<xs:element ref="ProductCompanyTaxID"/>
<xs:element name="ProductCompanyTaxID" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax30Car"/>

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Get SoftwareCertificateNumber
Number of the software certificate allocated to the entity that created the software, pursuant to Ordinance No. 363/2010, of 23th June.

docblock.description:
it doesn’t apply, the field must be filled in with “0” (zero).
<xs:element ref="SoftwareCertificateNumber"/>
<xs:element name="SoftwareCertificateNumber" type="xs:nonNegativeInteger"/>

description.compact:
Sets a new softwareCertificateNumber

Number of the software certificate allocated to the entity that created the software, pursuant to Ordinance No. 363/2010, of 23th June.

docblock.description:
it doesn’t apply, the field must be filled in with “0” (zero).
<xs:element ref="SoftwareCertificateNumber"/>
<xs:element name="SoftwareCertificateNumber" type="xs:nonNegativeInteger"/>

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Gets as productID
Name of the product that generates the SAF-T (PT).

Sets a new productID
Name of the product that generates the SAF-T (PT).

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Gets as productVersion
The product version shall be indicated
<xs:element ref="ProductVersion"/>
<xs:element name="ProductVersion" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax30Car"/>

Sets a new productVersion
The product version shall be indicated
<xs:element ref="ProductVersion"/>
<xs:element name="ProductVersion" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax30Car"/>

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Gets as headerComment
<xs:element ref="HeaderComment" minOccurs="0"/>
<xs:element name="HeaderComment" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax255Car"/>

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Gets as telephone
<xs:element ref="Telephone" minOccurs="0"/>
<xs:element name="Telephone" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax20Car"/>

<xs:element ref="Telephone" minOccurs="0"/>
<xs:element name="Telephone" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax20Car"/>

return.description: true if the value is valid

Gets as fax
<xs:element ref="Fax" minOccurs="0"/>
<xs:element name="Fax" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax20Car"/>

<xs:element name="Fax" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax20Car"/>

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Gets as email
<xs:element name="Email" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax254Car"/>
<xs:element ref="Email" minOccurs="0"/>

Sets a new email
<xs:element name="Email" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax254Car"/>
<xs:element ref="Email" minOccurs="0"/>

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Gets as website
<xs:element ref="Website" minOccurs="0"/>
<xs:element name="Website" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax60Car"/>

Sets a new website <xs:element ref="Website" minOccurs="0"/>
<xs:element name="Website" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax60Car"/>

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact: Validate documents number <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[^ ]+ [^/^ ]+/[0-9]+"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="60"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
